item.title: ** Skilled Video Editor Needed for UGC Content - Facebook Ads ** - Upwork
item.description:
Are you a talented video editor with a knack for creating compelling UGC content? I'm looking for an expert who can transform raw footage into engaging Facebook ads for a natural skincare brand. 🎥🌿

What I Need:

- Creative Editing: You should be able to select and edit the best sequences from the raw footage to produce multiple variations of a video ad.
- Engaging Content: Craft videos that capture attention, highlight product benefits, and drive conversions.
- Expertise in UGC Ads: Proven experience in creating direct response UGC Facebook ads that resonate with audiences.

Qualifications:

- Strong portfolio showcasing successful UGC video ads for Facebook.
- Ability to work independently and pick out the most impactful sequences.

Flexible budget for the right person & Potential for ongoing collaboration on future projects.

How to Apply:
Please share your portfolio with samples of similar projects and a brief overview of your editing approach. I'm excited to see your creativity in action!

Budget: $150
Posted On: June 18, 2024 15:12 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Testimonial Video, Video Commercial, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Facebook, Social Media Marketing, Ad Creative
Skills: Testimonial Video, Video Commercial, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Facebook, Social Media Marketing, Ad Creative
Country: Sweden
click to apply

item.title: Social Media Manager for Video Content Creation - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled social media manager to join our team for a two-month campaign. As the social media manager, your main responsibility will be to create and edit video content based on raw video footage that I provide that aligns with our brand and campaign objectives. You should have experience in video editing software and a keen eye for visual storytelling. You will be responsible for using Publer to schedule and publish the content on FB, IG, and TikTok. Additionally, I will need content to share on LinkedIn, but I will post it myself. Lastly, we'll need you to interact with followers in a professional and timely manner.

What I am looking for:
- Someone to edit raw VIDEO footage and pictures into compelling content using video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, Canva, or CapCut
- Hashtag research (5-8 hashtags max)
- Customize and improve the captions from the template I provide for content
- Post on FB/IG/TikTok, 1x per day 5x a week (Monday - Friday)
- Engage in best practices, including (Like post, Save post, Share post to stories)
- Strong creative and visual storytelling skills
- Excellent written and verbal communication skills
- Ability to work independently and meet tight deadlines

  Preferred Skills:
  - Experience with motion graphics and animation
  - Familiarity with social media analytics tools

This is a two-month-long medium-sized project. We are looking for an intermediate-level social media manager with prior experience in video content creation and social media management.

You will need to share your portfolio and work samples.

Budget: $300
Posted On: June 18, 2024 15:10 UTC
Category: Content Strategy
Skills:Social Media Marketing, Social Media Management, Instagram, Facebook
Skills: Social Media Marketing, Social Media Management, Instagram, Facebook
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Filipino Creator to be face of solar company - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for someone from the Philippines to be the face of our solar company, www.joinhelios.com, on our Youtube and Tiktok channels.

We will give you a script and you just need to film yourself saying it.  We will do all of the editing.

You should feel comfortable on camera and be ok with showing up in our videos and ads.

This is a great opportunity for an aspiring creator who wants to build their personal brand.

The first $100 of credit will be to cover about 60 minutes total of you filming yourself saying various scripts that we give you.

Budget: $100
Posted On: June 18, 2024 15:10 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:YouTube
Skills: YouTube
Country: Philippines

item.title: US UGC creator - Foodie Enthusiast - Upwork
item.description:
Looking for a US Based User Generated Content Creator to collaborate with us with our client. We ask our creators to create engaging videos for TikTok to help promote our clients.

- You would work with our in house team who would help you with all content ideation if needed
- Your role would be to send us a ready to post TikTok video ( UGC style ) that we would post to the clients account.
[ No need to post to your own account, but needs to be sent to us without a TikTok Watermark! ]
- Compensation is $150 for 5 videos and you get to keep the products! ( Pizza Oven / Pizza Sauce products! )


Thank you! :-)

Budget: $150
Posted On: June 18, 2024 15:08 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:How To, Testimonial Video, Demo Video, Explainer Video, Music & Sound Design, Promotional Video, Short Video Ad, Social Media Video, TikTok Video, Trailer, Voice-Over Recording, Unboxing Video, UGC, YouTube Video, Video Editing, Management Skills, Video Production, Influencer Marketing, Social Media Content Creation, Social Media Marketing, Social Media Management, TikTok, Facebook, Video Commercial, Instagram

item.description:

item.title: Social Media Video Editing - Upwork
item.description:
For this ongoing project you will be:

1. Editing rough draft videos to remove filler words, gaps and mistakes,
2. Add captions to the video (making sure not to cover anyone's face)
3. Add some links to the videos
4. Pick a good thumbail for each one
5. Propose a description, hashtags, title and posting scheduling for each video for approval.

Be familiar with Hootsuite & YouTube for posting,

Roughly 60 videos per month, about 20-30 seconds each video.

Thank you!


Hourly Range: $50.00-$60.00

item.title: Facebook Ad Editor - Upwork
item.description:
Job Summary:
We are seeking a creative and detail-oriented Facebook Ad Editor to create, edit, and optimize engaging ads for our Facebook campaigns. The ideal candidate will have a strong understanding of Facebook's advertising platform, excellent editing skills, and the ability to analyze ad performance metrics to drive successful marketing strategies.

Key Responsibilities:

- Ad Creation and Editing:
Develop visually appealing and compelling ad creatives that align with our brand voice and marketing goals.
Edit and enhance images, videos, and other multimedia content for Facebook ads.
Ensure all ad content adheres to Facebook's advertising policies and guidelines.

- Campaign Management:
Collaborate with the marketing team to plan and execute Facebook ad campaigns.
Set up and manage ad sets, targeting options, and budget allocations.
Monitor and adjust ads based on performance metrics and KPIs.

- Performance Analysis:
Analyze ad performance data to identify trends, insights, and areas for improvement.
Provide regular reports on ad performance, including click-through rates, conversion rates, and ROI.
Use A/B testing to optimize ad creatives and targeting strategies.

-Collaboration and Communication:
Work closely with the content and design teams to develop cohesive and effective ad campaigns.
Communicate with clients (if applicable) to understand their advertising needs and goals.
Stay updated on the latest trends and best practices in Facebook advertising.

- Compliance and Quality Assurance:
Ensure all ads comply with industry standards and ethical guidelines.
Review and proofread ad copy for accuracy and effectiveness.
Maintain a high level of attention to detail in all aspects of ad creation and editing.

Qualifications:

Education: Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Advertising, Communications, Graphic Design, or a related field preferred.
Experience:
Proven experience in creating and editing Facebook ads.
Familiarity with Facebook Ads Manager and other social media advertising tools.
Experience with graphic design software (e.g., Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator) and video editing tools (e.g., Adobe Premiere, Final Cut Pro).

Skills:
Strong creative and visual design skills.
Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
Analytical mindset with the ability to interpret data and make data-driven decisions.
Detail-oriented with strong organizational and multitasking abilities.
Ability to work independently and as part of a team in a fast-paced environment.


Hourly Range: $22.00-$70.00
Posted On: June 18, 2024 14:53 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Facebook Advertising, Video Editing, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Facebook Advertising, Video Editing, Adobe After Effects
Country: France
click to apply

item.title: Tik Tok Video Editor for Benjamin Button Collagen Beauty Brand - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented Tik Tok video editor to create engaging content for our brand, Benjamin Button. As an editor, you will be responsible for adding pictures, sound effects, and subtitles to our Tik Tok videos. Your creative skills will play a crucial role in enhancing our brand presence and driving user engagement. The ideal candidate should have a strong understanding of Tik Tok trends and be able to create visually appealing videos that align with our brand image. This is a great opportunity to showcase your editing skills and work with a growing beauty brand. Join our team and help us take Benjamin Button to the next level!

Skills required:

- Proficient in Tik Tok video editing
- Ability to add pictures, sound effects, and subtitles
- Creativity and a keen eye for visual aesthetics
- Familiarity with Tik Tok trends

Duration: 1 to 3 months

Expertise level: Intermediate


Posted On: June 18, 2024 14:49 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Graphic Design, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe After Effects, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Graphic Design, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe After Effects, Video Post-Editing

item.title: We are looking for a YouTube Video Editor! - Upwork
item.description:
Job details:
Niche: Finance History/Facts
Number of videos: Around 4-12 per month.
Length of videos: Around 13-18 minutes long.
Turnaround Time: 24-72 hrs per video
Duration of job: We are looking for a Long-Term relationship (1+ Years)
---
Hey there! Thank you for considering our job post. We are looking for an experienced Video Editor with previous experience working for YouTube channels.

We run multiple channels and we run a big channel in the Finance  niche. We will be creating videos on the following topics (initially): Finance History Stories/Facts

The video editor will be given a script and a voice over, his/her job will be to create a really complete and engaging video using that voice over and by performing the following tasks:

Add background music
Add existing clips from other videos (Under fair use) Add images
Add stock footage
Add Sound FX
Add transitions and titles
Among other tasks

Here is an example of the quality of videos we are looking for: https://youtu.be/kW6uIYcbniA?si=Kcku1YsjDBY20_3G

Having advanced English or being bilingual is a MUST, as well as being creative.
You also need to be resourceful since this job requires you to find online content that will help your video be more engaging and make it more impactful.
Some of the requirements to apply:
- Advanced video editing skills
- Previous experience working for YouTube channels (faceless channels preferred)
- 2D art and animation experience
- Creativity to enhance the video by making the script come to live (use of Sound FX, transitions, change in pacing, etc)

Please bid your price per video and send me some of your recent work [THIS IS A MUST].

Start your bid with “greencandle”, so we know you have read the post and understand the scope of the job.

Thanks in advance for your interest, and good luck.

Budget: $30
Posted On: June 18, 2024 14:47 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Explainer Video, Education, 2D Animation, 2D Art, Animation, 2D Design & Drawings
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Explainer Video, Education, 2D Animation, 2D Art, Animation, 2D Design & Drawings
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
Responsibilities:

- Creating multimedia meant for all social media platforms and through all the customer journey
- Integrating new ideas to the creative process for organization, edition, and performance.
- Being able to collaborate with your team in any challenge or task needed
- Being able to visualize and select from all our footage. Learning what makes a product take, the best one for the ADs.
- Delivering expected videos/assets on time
- Being able to interpret the requests of all the other teams and work in sync.
- Working in an organized way, respecting the process of the team.
- Working with specific guides as well as being able to work independently.

Requirements:
- 2+ years of experience as a Video Editor
- Strong creative skills
- Proactive, self-sufficient and with strong time management and communication skills
- Organized, able to work in a team
- Good spoken and written English skills
- Need to be detail-oriented, able to multitask, and handle tasks under pressure.
- Proficiency in Adobe Creative Cloud Applications.
- Knowledge of common interchange formats & codecs
- Bachelor degree in Film Production, related field, or equivalent work experience.


Hourly Range: $5.00-$7.00
Posted On: June 18, 2024 14:44 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Concept Video, Audio Editing, Dynamic Transition, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects, Video Commercial, Video Production, Testimonial Video

item.title: Video editor - Restaurant Specialty - Upwork
item.description:
Hello, we are looking for someone who can edit restaurant commercials. For this project we are looking for a promotional restaurant commercial and some social media promotional video.

Please feel free to bid what you feel is necessary to make this job really look good.

We want to find someone who we can use on a regular basis as we plan on doing a few restaurant advertisements a week once we are fully ramped up.

Included in your pricing, please let us know what the commercial costs and how many social media video posts we can get along with that. If there is any thing else you include, let us know as well!

We want to make this collaborative so if there is extra you need from us to calculate or make this job look good, just let me know.

Please make sure to include past works of restaurant promotional videos of your own when responding.

Thanks,
Matthew

item.title: Video Editor for Wim Hof Breathing Technique Video - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video editor to scrape and edit this Wim Hof Breathing Technique video
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tybOi4hjZFQ into an extended version of the technique. The task involves dividing the video into 4 rounds (instead if 3), with each round lasting 2 minutes of breathholding (instead of 1-1:30).

This means you need to adjust the sound and design a bit.
- Instead of 1:00 min or 1:30 min it's 2:00 min. for each breath-holding.
- The time between sequences needs to be longer instead of 1 min or 1:30 min, its 2 min.
- Instead of the timer saying 1:00 or 1:30 min, it's 2:00 min.
- Add a 4th sequence of 30 sec. breath in-and-out and 2 min breath-hold
- Everything needs to be the voice of Wim Hof, the instructor.
- Make sure that the transitions in sound and animations are correct.
Sounds would be something like "You are almost there" or "Do you want to prolong your breath hold..." "Okay, recovery breath in.
But also something like "30 min. left"
- Especially add this to the 4th 2:00 min breath-holding sequence.
- Add the talking of Wim Hof like "Be in this moment", "Let the body do what the body is capable of doing", and "Be aware of your heartbeat..." "Let that relaxation..."
into the extra seconds and 4th 2:00 min. Breath hold.
- Delete the advertising at the end.

- I also need it as a sound version

Probably, the total length of the video after editing will be around 15 min.


  Skills required:
  - Video editing

  This is a short-sized project with a duration of an hour or so

  Expertise level: Beginner / Intermediate

Budget: $20
Posted On: June 18, 2024 14:28 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing
Country: Germany
click to apply

item.title: YouTube Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
Seeking creative, experienced video editor. I am a content creator with an accumulative following over 250,000 across all platforms. (YouTube, TikTok, and Instagram.) I am in need of editing assistance for my YouTube videos. (Channel: (https://www.youtube.com/@MitchellPehlke) My content is sports / challenged based.

I post my YouTube videos every Tuesday at 5 PM EST.

One video per week. You will have 5 days to edit the footage. I would send you the footage via a google drive link on Sunday and complete the video by Friday. You will be paid $500 once I receive the final edit. Final videos are 11 - 15 minutes long. Must be able to work weekends and have extensive experience working with Final Cut Pro / Adobe.

Please provide links to previously edited to work. Thanks!

Budget: $500
Posted On: June 18, 2024 14:23 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing
Skills: Video Editing
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
